parsed_email.subject: RE: M/V Pelagia @ Paranaguá - Daily Report - Dated 12/01/2026 PM [HSA-0021/2026] / GARBAGE & SLUDGE DISPOSAL
parsed_email.body_text:
Message: 8464954
From: <pelagia@vessels.astraship.com>
To: "'Operations - Hellas Shipping Agencies'" <operations1@hellas-shipping.com.br>
Cc: commercial@hellas-shipping.com.br,michael.karasarinis@hellas-shipping.com.br,ops@astraship.com,"'Purchasing - Astra Shipmanagement Inc'" <purch@astraship.com>
Date: Tue, 13/Jan/2026 20:06:59 (UTC: +02:00)
Subject: RE: M/V Pelagia @ Paranaguá - Daily Report - Dated 12/01/2026 PM [HSA-0021/2026] / GARBAGE & SLUDGE DISPOSAL

To: HELLAS SHIPPING AGENCIES

Cc: As Addressed

Fm: Master – Pelagia

 

Dear Mr. Paulo/Garbriel,

 

Good day!

 

Reference to your below and further to our telcon, we will discharge sludge and garbage to Parana Oil which was arranged by Fertimport.

My Owners (ric) is also informed regarding above info.

 

Thank you and best regards,

 

Capt. Benjo Austin C. Dejelo

Master of MV PELAGIA

email: pelagia@vessels.astraship.com

Tel: +870773065896 [FBB]

GR DID: +30 2100220258

Telex: 424985110

 

From: Operations - Hellas Shipping Agencies <operations1@hellas-shipping.com.br>
Sent: 13 January 2026 15:54
To: pelagia@vessels.astraship.com
Cc: commercial@hellas-shipping.com.br; michael.karasarinis@hellas-shipping.com.br; ops@astraship.com; Purchasing - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <purch@astraship.com>; Operations - Hellas Shipping Agencies <operations1@hellas-shipping.com.br>
Subject: Re: M/V Pelagia @ Paranaguá - Daily Report - Dated 12/01/2026 PM [HSA-0021/2026] / GARBAGE & SLUDGE DISPOSAL

 

Dear  Capt. Benjo Austin C. Dejelo,

Good day, Master Sir

 

Thank you for your previous email well noted.

 

Kindly note that our sludge collector truck will come in the port at evening time today. We have not authorized any other trucks to attend the vessel during this period.

 

Thank you in advance.

 

Yours faithfully.

 

Attending all ports of South and Central America. Head office in 

Brazil and branch offices at Argentina, Uruguay, Peru, Chile, Colombia, 

Ecuador, Venezuela, Guiana, French Guiana, Suriname and Panama.

 

 

Paulo Furquim

Mobile number: +55 19 971534691

                                  +55 13 998014962

                                                                  

 

 

On Tue, Jan 13, 2026 at 12:31 PM <pelagia@vessels.astraship.com> wrote:

To: HELLAS SHIPPING AGENCY

Cc: As Addressed

Fm: Master – Pelagia

 

Dear Mr. Gabriel,

 

Good day!

 

Reference to your below, Please be informed Sludge disposal is now in progress and expected to complete abt 1900/2000LT. Garbage Truck also arrived.

 

Thank you and best regards,

 

Capt. Benjo Austin C. Dejelo

Master of MV PELAGIA

email: pelagia@vessels.astraship.com

Tel: +870773065896 [FBB]

GR DID: +30 2100220258

Telex: 424985110

 

From: Operations - Hellas Shipping Agencies <operations1@hellas-shipping.com.br>
Sent: 13 January 2026 14:28
To: pelagia@vessels.astraship.com
Cc: commercial@hellas-shipping.com.br; michael.karasarinis@hellas-shipping.com.br; ops@astraship.com; Purchasing - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <purch@astraship.com>; Operations - Hellas Shipping Agencies <operations1@hellas-shipping.com..br>
Subject: Re: M/V Pelagia @ Paranaguá - Daily Report - Dated 12/01/2026 PM [HSA-0021/2026] / GARBAGE & SLUDGE DISPOSAL

 

Capt. Benjo Austin C. Dejelo, Good day!

Garbage and sludge is scheduled to be removed today PM.
Port Authorities are facing some issues on clearance systems and the green light is taking longer than usual.

We shall inform you once clearance is indeed granted.

Our best regards,

Gabriel Felipe

Attending all ports of South and Central America. Head office in 

Brazil and branch offices at Argentina, Uruguay, Peru and Venezuela

Gabriel Felipe

Mobile number: +55 13 997645095 

 

 

Em ter., 13 de jan.. de 2026 às 08:52, <pelagia@vessels.astraship.com> escreveu:

To: HELLAS SHIPPING AGENCIES

Cc: As Addressed

Fm: Master – Pelagia

 

Dear Mr. Jorge,

 

Good day!

 

Further to below, please note ANVISA is now onboard, please confirm or advise schedule for garbage and sludge disposal so I can tell him in case he ask.

 

Thank you and best regards,

 

Capt. Benjo Austin C. Dejelo

Master of MV PELAGIA

email: pelagia@vessels.astraship.com

Tel: +870773065896 [FBB]

GR DID: +30 2100220258

Telex: 424985110

 

From: pelagia@vessels.astraship.com <pelagia@vessels.astraship.com>
Sent: 13 January 2026 01:47
To: 'operations1@hellas-shipping.com.br' <operations1@hellas-shipping.com.br>
Cc: 'accounts@hellas-shipping.com.br' <accounts@hellas-shipping.com.br>; 'commercial@hellas-shipping.com..br' <commercial@hellas-shipping.com.br>; 'michael.karasarinis@hellas-shipping.com.br' <michael.karasarinis@hellas-shipping.com.br>; 'ops@astraship.com' <ops@astraship.com>; 'Purchasing - Astra Shipmanagement Inc' <purch@astraship.com>
Subject: RE: M/V Pelagia @ Paranaguá - Daily Report - Dated 12/01/2026 PM [HSA-0021/2026]

 

To: HELLAS SHIPPING AGENCIES

Cc: As Addressed

Fm: Master – Pelagia

 

Dear Mr. Jorge,

 

Good day!

 

Please be informed vessel is berthed in Paranagua APPA Berth no. 204.

Kindly advise schedule for disposal of Sludge & Garbage and Provisions Delivery in order to prepare accordingly.

 

Thank you and best regards,

 

Capt. Benjo Austin C. Dejelo

Master of MV PELAGIA

email: pelagia@vessels.astraship.com

Tel: +870773065896 [FBB]

GR DID: +30 2100220258

Telex: 424985110

 

From: Operations Hellas Shipping <info1@hellas-shipping.com.br>
Sent: 12 January 2026 21:01
To: pelagia@vessels.astraship.com; ops@astraship.com
Cc: operations1@hellas-shipping.com.br; accounts@hellas-shipping.com.br; commercial@hellas-shipping.com.br; michael.karasarinis@hellas-shipping.com.br
Subject: M/V Pelagia @ Paranaguá - Daily Report - Dated 12/01/2026 PM [HSA-0021/2026]

 

To: Astra Shipmanagement Inc.
Fm: Hellas Shipping Agencies
Dated: 12/01/2026 PM

REF: M/V . Pelagia @ Paranaguá - Daily Report - HSA-0021/2026

Dear Sirs, good day.

Please find below daily report and following services performance schedule.

We are closely monitoring and shall keep you posted in case of any change:

Sailing prospects:
====================

ATA: January 11th, 2026, at 19:36h LT

ATB: January 12th, 2026
ETS: January 14th, 2026

Terminal: APPA/204
Operational: Loading
Cargo: Sugar
Quantity: 66000

Previous Port: TABONEO - Indonesia
Next Port:

Weather forecast:
=================

Services Expected
==================

1) Sludge and garbage - Free of charge:
- Awaiting confirmation.

 

Attending all ports of South and Central America. Head office in
Brazil and branch offices at Argentina, Uruguay, Peru, Chile, Colombia,
Ecuador, Venezuela, Guiana, French Guiana, Suriname and Panama.

Jorge Geraldi
Mobile number: +55 13 99801-4962

 

Hellas Shipping Agencies Ltda.

Jorge Geraldi | Operations department

www.hellas-shipping.com.br

 

operations1@hellas-shipping.com.br

CEP: 13.084-759 - Campinas - SP (Headquarters)

Phones: +55 19 2121-3444

- Headquarters - São Paulo, since 2016

- Commercial Office in Athens - Greece, since 2016

- Attending all ports of South America, since 2023

 

Matheos Pagonis Molik - Head of Operations

Mobile: +55 11 99796 9695

 

Gabriel Felipe - Operations Coordinator

Mobile: +55 13 99764 5095 (New Number)

 

João Chagas - Operations Coordinator

Mobile: +55 11 94451 9695

 

Romulo S. dos Santos

Mobile: +55 11 99899 9695

 

Captain Michael Karasarinis - Managing Director

Mobile: +55 11 97495 9695 (Office hours)
